mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: In 1838 Schleiden suggested that all plant were made of cells, In 1838 Schleiden suggested to all plants were made of cells, In 1838 Schleiden suggested that all plants were made of cells, In 1838 Schleiden suggest that all plants were made of cells

options.a: In 1838 Schleiden suggest that all plants were made of cells
options.b: In 1838 Schleiden suggested that all plant were made of cells
options.c: In 1838 Schleiden suggested to all plants were made of cells
options.d: In 1838 Schleiden suggested that all plants were made of cells
